qas.question: When was there an attempt to reform the law of the EU?

answers.text: referendum in France and the referendum in the Netherlands

the referendum in France and the referendum in the Netherlands

qas.question: How similar was the Lisbon Treaty to the constitutional treaty?
What type of treaty was the Lisbon Treaty?
Is the Lisbon Treaty one that would alter existing treaties or replace them?

answers.text: it significantly altered the existing treaties

qas.question: What reform was attempted following the Nice Treaty?

answers.text: there was an attempt to reform the constitutional law of the European Union and make it more transparent
an attempt to reform the constitutional law of the European Union and make it more transparent
there was an attempt to reform the constitutional law of the European Union and make it more transparent
an attempt to reform the constitutional law of the European Union and make it more transparent

qas.question: What was an additional projected effect of the attempted reform?

this would have also produced a single constitutional document

qas.question: Which caused the reform to never come into force?

qas.question: What treaty took the place of constitutional treaty?

plausible_answers.text: there was an attempt to reform the constitutional law of the European Union and make it more transparent

qas.question: What did not happen after the Nice Treaty?

plausible_answers.text: the referendum in France and the referendum in the Netherlands

qas.question: Which caused the reform to come into force?
